sentences.sContent: ...a potpourri of architectural styles from all over the world.
sentences.sCn: ...一种世界各地建筑风格的荟萃。

synos.tran: 百花香；混合物；杂曲；大杂烩

remMethod.val: pot(锅) + pour(倾倒)+ri → 倒在一个锅里 → 混杂物

trans.tranOther: a mixture of pieces of dried flowers and leaves kept in a bowl to make a room smell pleasant
